title: Anyone plays on 1440p resolution?
body: I have just upgraded to a 1440p monitor on a GTX 1080. FPS is good (120-140) but the screen is a little too big for the game. Do I get used to this or is it actually not small enough to play well? I'm plat3 and I feel like I can hardly watch the minimap as it's a little too far. I also kinda have a hard time noticing that someone is actually walking beside me for how big the screen is.
